page.title: 04PEOPLE'S LIVES
page.content: The people who live in this area are generally{very content. }In the village people move in and out quite regularly, but most have{lived here {for some years. }Out of the village, most people have been here for most or all of their lives. They all{like {living here,}because of the {countryside}and because they like the {life in a village. }King's Caple has got bigger, but outside it people say that there has been{no real change, and they{don't want any changes made. Some go into{Hereford}quite regularly, but there are a lot who only go once a month or even less. The{bus service is not at all good, so they travel by {car. Television}is the only entertainment available to them unless they go into town, and they spend most of their spare time at home. They are{very relaxed, happy people.
